attributes.action: look into Peter Sutcliffe's appeal for release.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Peter Sutcliffe, the Yorkshire Ripper, is appealing to the High Court to find out if he will eventually be released from prison. We the undersigned do not believe this should ever happen.

rejection.details: This Office cannot comment on individual cases.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
